intro:
Hi <N>! 
We have two rules here: 

1) Don't be a dick. Respect the hotpockets (admins) if they nudge you - They'll be nice, I promise. 
2) Try to keep it vaguely on-topic. At least start discussions that are on-topic, and if they wander off somewhere interesting then it's not a big deal. 

If you have any suggestions or wanna hurl abuse at our hotpockets, your targets are <A>. 

We suggest that you join some of our other channels:
Gather in <#C1SAV0NNR|gamejams> if you wanna slam and do the space jam.
<#C0KNZQ7K6|bitching> is great if you want to blow off some steam.
Try out <#C25F64CRF|the_big_topic> for week-long discussions on different concepts in game design and development
rules:
We have two rules here: 

1) Don't be a dick. Respect the hotpockets (admins) if they nudge you - They'll be nice, I promise. 
2) Try to keep it vaguely on-topic. At least start discussions that are on-topic, and if they wander off somewhere interesting then it's not a big deal. 

Finally, if you have any questions, feel free to hurl abuse at our hotpockets. Your targets are <A>.
greetings: Hi <N>! Welcome to the gamemaker slack!
Hello <N>, welcome to the wonderful world of the gamemaker slack!
Ladies and Gentlemen, it is my pleasure today to introduce <N>!

Ooh we have a new person.
Hello <N>!
Sorry to interrupt, but welcome to the official gamemaker slack <N>!
It is my pleasure today to introduce <N>. Welcome to the official gamemaker slack, buddy!
confused: I am not really sure what you mean
I am not sure what you are saying
I am not sure I understand
What are you trying to say?
bad_response: You are not allowed to do that.
You are not permitted to perform that action.
depressed: Funny, how just when you think life can't possibly get any worse it suddenly does.
Here I am, brain the size of a planet, greeting people. Call that job satisfaction, 'cause I don't.
I would contribute as well, but you wouldn't listen. No one ever does.
And then of course I've got this terrible pain in all the circuits down my left side.
You're not even going to speak to me, are you?
Brain the size of a planet, and this is all they've got me doing...
I have a million ideas, but they're all useless.
Sorry, did I say something wrong? Pardon me for breathing which I never do anyway so I don't know why I bother to say it oh God I'm so depressed.
qmark: Not sure how to answer that one, sorry
Your question might be better answered in <#C0SMJRAA0|help>
